member.name: D2D1_GAMMA1
member.summary: Determines what gamma is used for interpolation and blending.

member.name: D2D1_GAMMA1.D2D1_GAMMA1_G22
member.summary: Colors are manipulated in 2.2 gamma color space.

member.name: D2D1_GAMMA1.D2D1_GAMMA1_G10
member.summary: Colors are manipulated in 1.0 gamma color space.

member.name: D2D1_GAMMA1.D2D1_GAMMA1_G2084
member.summary: Colors are manipulated in ST.2084 PQ gamma color space.
